data.title: 'Simpsons' - Season 6
data.meta_description: This is a quiz about the great episode Lisa on Ice from season 6. I hope you enjoy it. - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author littlebigmom)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Who wrote the episode "Lisa on Ice"?

Answer: Mike Scully

Mike Scully has also written the great episodes "Team Homer" and "Lisa's Date With Density".

2. Who directed this episode?

Answer: Bob Anderson

Bob Anderson has also directed "Bart's Inner Child" and "Bart's Comet".

3. What is the chalkboard gag?

Answer: I will not dissect things unless instructed.

4. What does Homer tease Maggie with at the beginning of the episode?

Answer: a beer can

5. Springfield Youth Center: Building Unrealistic Hopes Since ____.

Answer: 1966

This can be seen when Lisa goes to the basketball tryouts.

6. What kind of pj's does Bart have?

Answer: Cowboy

This can be seen near the beginning of the episode when Lisa throws a snowball at Bart in bed. He then runs outside and the kids make fun of his pj's.

7. What is Snake's prison number?

Answer: 7F20

This is seen when Clancy invites the prisoners to watch his hockey team play. He says he'll let them watch if they promise not to escape. After Snake says no Wiggum responds, "You can leave but you can't do any more crimes." Snake then says no again and Clancy responds, "I'll take that as a yes."

8. What is the name of Clancy's (Bart's) team?

Answer: Mighty Pigs

This appears at the beginning of the first game when it shows the names of the teams along the boards.

9. What is the name of Apu's (Lisa's) team?

Answer: Kwik-E-Mart Gougers

This appears when it shows Apu at his bench and on the boards in front of his bench and it reveals the name of the team.

10. How much money does Moe owe to people in total?

Answer: $64,000

Moe says this when he comes into the Simpson home during dinner and Marge kicks him out.

11. What kind of drink does Homer drink at the arena?

Answer: Big Lush

You see Homer drinking this during Bart's first game.

12. What is the name of the Springfield Elementary auditorium?

Answer: Butthead Memorial Auditorium

Principal Skinner says this over the P.A. when he announces that there will be an assembly.

13. What is the colour of Bart's jersey?

Answer: blue

14. What is coming out of the apple on Dolph's Newton?

Answer: worm

You see this when Dolph writes "beat up Martin" on the Newton.

15. Bart shoots right-handed.

Answer: False

You can tell he is left-handed because you can see him taking a shoot with his left hand.

Source: Author littlebigmom

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor ladymacb29 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
